title: Atin Agnihotri
subtitle: Techie, Thinker, Writer, History Buff
body: I'm a iOS and React Native enthusiast. I've previously had experience in Animation and Production Automation tooling with Python at Mikros (Technicolor A&G at the time) and as a Mobile Application QA, working on Manual and Automation Testing with Python, Java and Swift at Paytm Money. Here you'll find some samplars of work I've been doing in my free time.
